agentAbility.name: Scavenge
agentAbility.description: Raketa loads his gun with scrap and boosts the engine. While the ability is active, he fires canister shots and his boost is increased.

primaryAttack.name: Autoloader
primaryAttack.description: Loads a magazine which can rapidly fire, followed by a longer reload. Most effective at close range.

tankAbilities.name: Rocket Barrage
tankAbilities.description: Launches a limited-range rocket barrage of HE rockets at the target location, highly effective against exterior modules. Stunned or Silenced status interrupts the effect.

tankAbilities.name: Afterburner
tankAbilities.description: When boosted, the tank's Turbine engine provides extra speed and releases heat behind it, igniting opponents and flammable materials.
